Name: Master Cube
About the game: Master Cube is a 3d action platformer that's easy to learn and difficult to master. With original levels, and different styles of playing to becoming a professional Master Cube Player. This is a fast trial and error game, and at the same time, it's enjoyable and fun for all. Within this game, you will test your skills exceeding your limits such as dodging obstacles in your path by varying your speed or adapting yourself to more styles of play. Each level has 3 different variations depending on the difficulty such as, level design, the damage and amount of enemies. Why choose Master Cube? - Different styles of playing - Variety of levels - Each level studied for its own difficulty - The game adapts to your ability - Hard to master, simple to play - A lot of achievements - Sometimes you will have to discover the path between light and darkness
